website_summaries.verdict: A fine example of Seiko watchmaking elegance in a stunning dress watch with diamonds,  mother of pearl, and an eye-catching fit and finish.
pros: Lots of delicate features in this nuanced and lavish timepiece
cons: Should not be worn when bathing or swimming

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty and looks exactly as ordered. Needs a few links removed from the band before I can wear it. The battery won’t hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: M&M 85

customer_reviews.title: Shocked
customer_reviews.text: I received a different watch instead of this one which I ordered.Still in a state of shock as it is the first time this happened to me via Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Naeem Khan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. The watch is beautiful. Photos do not do it justice. Recipient extremely happy and using daily.
customer_reviews.author: Slrpnana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Live this watch classy yet great for everyday Very comfortable and looks nice on my wrist love the solar so no batteries yeah Had to remove several links no biggie
customer_reviews.author: Donna Miller

customer_reviews.title: This had a push latch on either side to remove
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to blend with my word clothes but it has just enough reflection of color to make it "cute". Nothing dull about it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she was very surprised and happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the watch as an Anniversary Gift for my Wife. She is thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Seiko
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Seiko watch! Dressy enough to wear at night also! It runs beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Brennan Kerhoulas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful, great value, very classy... Overall I adore this item!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Carter Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: The gift arrived early and was in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.text: The watch I bought for my wife's birthday was priced good and is as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wren

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, using it for work very stron I work for retail.
customer_reviews.author: Noemi Chagoya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Versital Watch
customer_reviews.text: I wear a lot of silver jewelry. This solar watch is so beautiful. You could wear it with jeans or with an evening gown. I love the substantial cuff-like band.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Nored

product_meta.title: Seiko Women's TRESSIA Japanese-Quartz Watch with Stainless-Steel Strap, Silver, 10 (Model: SUP332)
feature_bullets: Water resistant to 30m (100ft): in general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming or bathing
